Plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
Title: We're the Millers
Writer: Bob Fisher (screenplay), Steve Faber (screenplay), Sean Anders (screenplay), John Morris (screenplay), Bob Fisher (story), Steve Faber (story)
Actors: Jennifer Aniston, Jason Sudeikis, Emma Roberts, Will Poulter
tomatoConsensus: We're the Millers squanders its potential with an uneven, lazily assembled story..
